creator: CodeEaX
descriptionHtml:
All the information about the scheme is given in our application, Although the application is not official(https://revenueassam.nic.in/dhar/index.php/Welcome/SelectLOC), but on this application you will be taken to the official website, from where you can take all the information about the Dharitree - Assam Land Record (https://revenueassam.nic.in/dhar/index.php/Welcome/SelectLOC).


Dharitree - Assam Land Record (https://revenueassam.nic.in/dhar/index.php/Welcome/SelectLOC) is a digital portal for land records launched by the Revenue Council of Government of Assam. Before the introduction of Dharani, all the task related to the record of land such as Khatauni system, Jamabandi, etc. were done recording manually on papers. But now Telangana Government has computerized all the land record activities in the state. This helps in keeping the account/ record of a land. It includes all the description of a land, its owner and other information in detail. It has been implemented in all the districts of the state.

Dharitree - Assam Land Record App Features-
1.Search New Khasra/Khatauni Format in Assam
2.Search Dharitree/Assam Land Details
3.Search Bhunaksha/Assam Digitized cadastral maps
4.Search Panjeeyan/Assam Property Registration
5.Search Noc/Assam No Objection Certificate

Other Dharitree - Assam Land Record App Features-
- Get your Land Record/Khatian/Plot Information for all Assam Districts
- Search Assam Land Record by Khasra / Khesra / Khatian Number
- Search Assam Land Record by Khata / Gata Number
- Search Assam Land Record by Registry Number
- Search Assam Land Records by Name

Following are the steps to get your land information
(अपने खाता की जानकारी प्राप्त करने की प्रक्रिया )
Step 1) Select District/जिले का चयन करें
Step 2) Select Tahasil/तहसीलका चयन करें
Step 3) Select Village/ गावं का चयन करें
Step 4) Select Halka/हलका चुनें
Step 5) select the year/वर्ष का चुनाव करें

You will get answers to all these questions-
How can I check my land record in Assam?
What is Patta number in Assam?
What is registry of property?
What is land Khatian number?
How I can check my Land record?
Where can I find my dag number in Assam?
How can I check my Jamabandi online in Assam?
How can I know my Patta number in Assam?
How can I download land revenue payment receipt from Assam?




Disclaimer:
*We are not any official partner of the Government or a linked
with any way with government. We just show their website in
our application as webview format
We do not own any website available in app
This application is very useful for Indian people to find the best
digital servie in their state or city
We do not affiliated with any government entity services or person
* This APP is NOT associated, affiliated, endorsed, sponsored or approved by Dharani- Telangana Land Record (https://revenueassam.nic.in/dhar/index.php/Welcome/SelectLOC).
descriptionShort: Fastest and easy way to find Dharitree Assam Land Records
title: Dharitree - Assam Land Records
